title: My Only One (No Hay Nadie Más)
lyrics:
I remember when I met you
I didn't want to fall
I telt my heads
Were shaking
Cause you looked so
Beautiful

The one

When you played my favorite song



I don't know why

But every time I look

Into your eyes

I see a thousand falling shooting stars

And yes I love you

I can't believe

That every night you re

By my side

When you're falling

When the rain gets raugh

I'll just sweep you

And tix you

With my love



My only one

My only one



Tell me how you do it

I can (?) breathe

With the smile you get

You get the best ot me

And alla i really want

Is to give you

All ot me



Tell me him you do it

How yo brihg me back

You bring me back to lite

Then make my heart stop

I can’t take it



I don’t know why

But every time I look

Into your eyes

I see a thousand talling shooting stars

And yes I love you

I can´t believe

That every night you re

By my side



Voy a cuidarte por las noches

Voy amarte sin reproches

Y aunque existan mil razones para renunciar



Promise I’ll stay here

Till the morning

And pick up

When you’re talling

When the rain gets raugh

When you’ve had enough

I’ll just sweep you



Ott your teet

And tix you

With my love



My only one

There’s no one else

My only one

There’s no one else

You are my only one

It’s just there´s

My only oe

My only one
